Class TypeError

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • analysis.TypeError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TypeError
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    This class deals with error messages. Has methods to return position, error message.
    See Also:
